CustomField.description: Used in related list to provide direct link to edit the Sakeholder record. (not having to add the "Name" field to a crowded listview)
CustomField.formula: HYPERLINK("/?sort=" & Contact__r.FirstName & Contact__r.LastName, "", '_self') & HYPERLINK( Id , Contact__r.FirstName & " "& Contact__r.LastName )
CustomField.label: Contact
